Question: day by
Answer: mujhey afsws hay ، lekin "day by" ayk mkhff hay jo mtadd chyzawn ka hawalha dy sakta haay۔azuafy syak wa sbak kay baghair ، main is bat ka tayn karnay sy kasar hon keh aap khasa tawr par kis chyza ka zakr kar rahay hayn۔kya aap braha krm mazeed malwmat fraham krsktay hain ya apnay swal ko wazuha krsktay hayn؟

Question: ayk tybl aur dayta bys main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys kay tnazar main ، ayk tybl aur ayk dayta bys ka talk hay lekin alag alag tsawrat۔ ayk dayta bys ayk mnzam aur mnzam tarykay sy mhafwza krdha dayta ka ayk mnzam mjmwaha haay۔yha ayk kntynr hay jo mtadd mtalkha jdwlwn kay sath sath dyghr dayta bys ashyaa jesay nzaaray ، asharyha jat ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar aur bohat kuch rkhta haay۔dayta bys ko dayta ko mwsar andaza main astwr karnay ، nzam wa nsk aur bazayaft karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ dusri taraf ، ayk tybl dayta bys ka bnyady jzaw haay۔yha ktaarwn aur kalmwn main mnzam dayta kay zakhyray ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ayk tybl main kalmwn ka ayk wzuahaty syt hawta hay jo dayta ki un aksam ki wzuahat krta hay jo zakhyrha ki jaskty hain ، aur ktaaryn jo nmaindghy krty hain

Question: dayta ki mkhtlf aksam kon sy hain jo MySQL dayta bys main mhafwza ki jaskty hayn؟
Answer: ays kyw ayl dayta bys main ، aap apni zurwryat ki bnyad par mkhtlf ksm kay dayta ko astwr krsktay hayn۔ays kyw ayl mtadd aadad wa shmar ki aksam fraham krta hay jn ko mndrjha zayl aham aksam main drjha bndy kya gaya haay: addy aksam: addy aksam (jysay ، tynyint ، ant ، bghynt): pori tadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ flwtngh pwaint aksam (jysay ، flwt ، dabl)aasharyha nmbr۔ fksda pwaint aksam (jysay ، aasharyha): ayn mtaabk aasharyha hasab kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ astrngh ki aksam: krdar ki aksam (jysay ، char ، wrchr): harfywmyrk ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay

Question: ayk bnyady klyd kya haay؟
Answer: ayk bnyady klyd ayk kalm ya kalmwn ka ayk syt hay jo dayta bys tybl main hay jo tybl main hr rykarda ko mnfrd tawr par shnakht krta haay۔yha ayk anwkha shnakht knndha kay tawr par kam krta hay aur is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh jdwl main hr ktaar ko anfrady tawr par shnakht kya jaskta hay aur is tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔ yahan ayk bnyady klyd ki kuch aham khsawsayat hayn: anfradyt: bnyady klydy kalm (zabanyn) main hr kdr mnfrd honi chahaiay۔jdwl main kesi bhi do ktaarwn main ayk hi bnyady klydy kdr nahin hawskty haay۔ is ki koi adm asthakam: bnyady klydy kalm (zabanyn) kaladm akdar par mushtamil nahin hawsktay hayn۔tybl ki hr saf ki praimry klydy kalm (s main ayk drst kdr honi chahaiay

Question: ghair mlky klyd kya haay؟
Answer: ghair mlky klyd ayk kalm ya kalmwn ka ayk syt hay jo dayta bys tybl main hay jo do jdwlwn kay mabyn lnk ya rshtha kaim krta haay۔yha kesi aur jdwl ki bnyady klyd kay hawalay sy ، do myzawn kay mabyn talkat pyda krta haay۔ ghair mlky chabyan kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: rshtha: ayk ghair mlky klyd do myzawn kay mabyn talkat kaim krty hay ، jsay aam tawr par "waldyn" tybl kaha jata haay۔۔

Question: andayks kya haay؟
Answer: dayta bys kay tnazar main ، ayk andayks ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo dayta bys tyblza par dayta bazayaft kay kamwn ki rftar ko bhatr bnata haay۔yha dayta ko mwsar tlash ، chhantnay aur fltrngh ki ajazat denay kay liye ayk tybl kay ayk ya zayada kalmwn par bnaya gaya haay۔ asharyha kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: dahanchha: ayk andayks ko aam tawr par ayk alyhadha dayta dahanchha kay tawr par nafza kya jata hay js main ayk kapy ya sbsyt hawta haay۔dayta ka

Question: ayk nzaarha kya haay؟
Answer: dayta bys main ، ayk nzaarha ayk wrchwil tybl hay jo ayk ya zayada mwjwdha jdwlwn ya nzaarwn sy akhza kya gaya haay۔yha apnay ka koi dayta astwr nahin krta hay blkha bnyady jdwlwn sy dayta ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk ya aasan tarykay sy pysh karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ayk nzaarha ayk pehlay sy taay shuda astfsar kay tawr par kam krta hay js ka astamal aadad wa shmar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay ghwya yeh ayk bakaadha jdwl haay۔ yahan nzaryat kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: dahanchha: ayk nzaarha ayk astfsar kay zaryaha byan kya gaya hay js main kalmwn aur ktaar ko shaml karnay ki wzuahat ki hogi haay۔

Question: zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar kya haay؟
Answer: zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka namzad aur zakhyrha shuda syt hay jo dayta bys main mrtb aur mhafwza kya jata haay۔

Question: mhark kya haay؟
Answer: dayta bys main ، ayk trghr ayk dayta bys aabjykt hay jo kesi tybl sy wabstha hawta hay aur mkhsawsa wakaat ya shraita kay jwab main khud bkhwd aml ya ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka ayk syt anjam dyta haay۔mharkat ko kuch khasa karrwaiywn sy pehlay ya is kay bad chalw karnay kay liye byan kya jata hay jesay dakhl ، ap dayt ، hazaf karna ، ya yahan tak keh kesi khasa haalt pr۔ yahan mharkat kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: wakaha par mbny: trghrza wakaha par mbny hawtay hain aur khud bkhwd amldraamd karty hain jab koi mkhsawsa wakaha yahaalt hawty haay۔aam wakaat main dakhl ، ap dayt ، kesi tybl par aapryshn hazaf karain ، ya mkhsawsa kalm akdar main tbdyly shaml hayn۔ aml aur ays kyw ayl kay byanat:

Question: lyn dyn kya haay؟
Answer: dayta bys kay tnazar main ، tranzaykshn sy mrad kam ki ayk mntaky akaiy hay jo ayk ya zayada dayta bys ki karrwaiywn par mushtamil haay۔yha karwaiyan ، jesay dakhl ، ap dayt ، ya hazaf karnay walon ko ayk sath mil kar ayk wahad hum aahangh ywnt bnanay kay liye ghrwp kya jata hay jsay mkml tawr par aml main lana zurwry haay۔ lyn dyn kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: aytmyty is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh tranzaykshn ko ayk nakabl tskhyr ywnt kay tawr par smjha jata haay۔kam ka.as ka mtalb yeh hay keh ya tou lyn dyn kay andr mwjwd tamam karwaiyan kamyaby kay sath mkml hawjaty hain ، ya un main sy koi bhi nahin haay۔aghr lyn dyn ka koi bhi hasaha nakam hawjata hay tou ، pchhly karrwaiywn kay zaryaha ki janay wali tamam tbdylyan waps krdy gain ، aur dayta bys apni asal haalt main waps aajata haay۔

Question: kesi slykt aur hazaf shuda byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk mntkhb byan aur hazaf karnay wala byan dono ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo dayta bys kay sath taaml kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: mntkhb byan: mntkhb krdha byan ko ayk ya zayada dayta bys tyblza sy dayta bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh kalmwn ki wzuahat krta haay۔

Question: shmwlyt aur ywnyn kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk jwain astytmnt aur ywnyn ka byan dono ays kyw ayl aapryshn hain jo ayk sy zayada jdwlwn ya ntaij kay sytwn sy dayta ko ykja karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn: shaml byan: ayk jwain astyt ka astamal mtalkha kalm kay darmiyan do ya zayada jdwlwn sy jma karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔an ki mdd sy aap ko mtadd jdwlwn sy dayta bazayaft karnay ki ajazat mlty hay js main yeh wzuahat ki jati hay keh jdwlwn sy kis tarah ka talk haay۔

Question: kahan aur ayk shk main frk haay؟
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، jahan shk aur hony wali shk dono ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un kay mkhtlf mkasad hain aur mkhtlf syak wa sbak main astamal hawtay hayn: jahan shk: jahan shk kesi haalt par mbny tybl sy ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ yeh haay۔aam tawr par byanat ko mntkhb ، ap dayt ، ya hazaf karnay kay sath mil kar astamal kya jata haay۔ jahan kesi bhi ghrwha bndy ya ajtmaay karrwaiywn sy pehlay shk ka atalak hawta haay۔ yeh mkhsawsa haalt ki bnyad par anfrady ktaar ko fltr krta hay ،

Question: kesi ghrwp kay zaryaha aur ayk alag byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk ghrwp bazaria byan aur ayk alag byan dono ko ays kyw ayl main kalm ya kalmwn kay syt sy anwkhy akdar haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un ka atalak mkhtlf syak wa sbak main hawta hay aur is kay mkhtlf mkasad hawtay hayn: byan kay zaryaha ghrwp: ghrwp kay zaryaha ghrwp ktaarwn ko ghrwp karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki bnyad pr۔ yeh aam tawr par mjmway afaal kay sath mil kar astamal kya jata hay jesay rkm ، ghnty ، aay wy jy ، wghyrha۔

Question: andrwny shmwlyt aur baien bazaw main shaml hony main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk andrwny shmwlyt aur baien shmwlyt dono tarah kay shaml hain jo ays kyw ayl main ayk sy zayada jdwlwn sy ktaarwn ko aktha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hain ، lekin un kay mkhtlf tarza aml hain aur mkhtlf ntaij tyar karty hayn: andrwny shmwlyt: ayk andrwny shmwlyt sirf dono jdwlwn sy mmasal ktaaryn waps krty hay js par mbny haayjwain kndayshn۔ yeh dono jdwlwn sy ktaarwn ka antkhab krta hay jahan jwain ki haalt mtamin haay۔ agar ayk tybl main ktaar kay liye koi mych nahin hay tou ، is ktaar ko ntyjha syt main shaml nahin kya gaya haay۔ andrwny shmwlyt kay ntaij kay syt main sirf ktaaryn shaml hayn۔jhaan dono jdwlwn kay liye jwain ki haalt drst haay۔ andrwny shmwlyt kay liye nhaw aam tawr par is tarah lghta haay:

Question: ayk ghnty aur rkm kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: akdar kay ayk syt par hasab ktab karnay kay liye astamal hony waly ays kyw ayl main ayk ghnty ka byan aur rkm ka byan dono mjmway afaal hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hain aur mkhtlf ntaij pysh karty hayn: ghnty ka byan: ghnty ka byan ktaarwn ki tadad ya ghyr- ghyr- ki tadad ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔kalm main kaladm akdar۔ yeh ntyjha syt ya ktaarwn kay ayk ghrwp kay andr kesi mkhsawsa kalm ya azahaar kay wakaat ki tadad ki ghnty krta haay۔ ghnty kay byan ka ntyjha ayk add kymt hay jo ktaarwn ya ghair nwl akdar ki ghnty ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ghnty kay fnkshn par ghwr nahin hawta hay

Question: zayada sy zayada aur ayk mnt kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk zayada sy zayada byan aur ayk mnt ka byan dono hi ays kyw ayl main mjmway kam hain jo baltrtyb zayada sy zayada aur kam sy kam akdar tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، baltrtyb ، kalm ya akdar kay syt kay andr۔taham ، un kay mkhtlf mkasad hain aur mkhtlf ntaij braamd hawtay hayn: zayada sy zayada byan: zayada sy zayada byan kesi kalm main zayada sy zayada kymt ya akdar ka ayk syt tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yeh mkhsawsa kalm main mwjwd aaly trien kymt ko lwtata haay۔ zayada sy zayada fnkshn astamal hawta haay۔addy ya tarykh/wkt kay kalmwn kay sath lekin tlash karnay kay liye strngh kalmwn kay sath bhi astamal kya jaskta hay

Question: INT aur dayt taim dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ays kyw ayl dayta bys main mkhtlf ksm ki malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk INT dayta ki ksm aur dayt taim dayta ki ksm ka astamal kya jata hay ، aur un main alag alag khsawsayat aur mkasad hayn: INT dayta ki ksm: INT dayta ki ksm addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔part.ynt dayta ki ksm aam tawr par addy malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay js main aasharyha ، IDs ، ya mkdar jesay aasharyha ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔ akdar ki had jo ayk main mhafwza ki jaskty haay۔

Question: flwt aur dabl dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، flwt aur dabl dono ko aasharyha sahat sy mtalk flwtngh pwaint nmbr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh sahat sy mtalk aur astwryj ki zurwryat kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn: flwt dayta ki ksm: flwt dayta ki ksm flwtngh pwaint nmbrwn ko wahad prysyzayshn kay sath astwr karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔.yha aam tawr par flwt (py) kay tawr par mtayn kya jata hay ، jahan 'py' sahat sy mtalk ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main handswn ki tadad ki nshandhay hawty hay jo zakhyrha ki jaskty haay۔akdar ki ayk wsya rynj ko zakhyrha krskta hay ، lekin yeh dabl kay mkablay main kam sahat sy mtalk fraham krta haay۔ flwt kay liye astwryj ki zurwrt

Question: aasharyha aur addy aadad wa shmar ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ays kyw ayl main ، aasharyha aur addy aadad wa shmar ki aksam ka astamal fksda pwaint aasharyha aasharyha ko ayn mtaabk aasharyha sahat sy mtalk zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔wha bnyady tawr par ayk jesay aur kar saktay hain

Question: bnyady klyd aur ayk anwkhy klyd main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dono praimry klydy aur anwkhy klyd ka astamal dayta bys tyblza main anfradyt ko nafza karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، lekin un ki mkhtlf khsawsayat aur mkasad hayn: bnyady klyd: ayk bnyady klyd ayk kalm hay

Question: ghair mlky klyd aur chyk rkawt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ghair mlky klyd aur chyk rkawt dono hi mykanzam hain jo dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl dayta bys main astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: ghair mlky klyd: ayk tybl main kalm ya kalmwn ka mjmwaha hay jo bnyady klyd ya anwkha haay۔ayk aur jdwl ki klyd۔ yeh do jdwlwn kay mabyn ayk rshtha kaim krta hay ، jsay ryfrnl salmyt ki rkawt kay nam sy jana jata haay۔ ghair mlky klydy rkawt is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh hawalha denay waly kalm (zabanyn) main mwjwd akdar hawalha tybl kay bnyady klyd ya anwkhay klydy kalm (zabanyn) main mwjwd hayn۔mstkl mzaajy ko brkrar rkhnay aur nafza karnay kay liye ghair mlky klydy rkawtyn astamal ki jati hain

Question: NULL aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: rkawtwn ki wzuahat kay liye ays kyw ayl dayta bys main astamal hony waly dono mykanzam hain

Question: chyk aur ghair mlky klydy rkawt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk chyk rkawt aur ghair mlky klydy rkawt dono hain

Question: NULL aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: kalm ki akdar par rkawtwn ki wzuahat kay liye ays kyw ayl dayta bys main astamal hony waly dono mykanzam hain ، lekin un kay mkhtlf mkasad hayn: kaladm nahin rkawt ka astamal nahin kya jata hay keh kalm hamyshha ghair nwl par mushtamil hawta haay۔value.it is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh kalm ko is ki kdr kay tawr par kaladm nahin kya jaskta۔ jab kalm par kaladm rkawt ki wzuahat nahin ki jati hay tou is ka mtalb yeh hawta hay keh dayta kay doran kalm ki kdr honi chahaiay۔

Question: ayk chhwta sa tybl aur byan sy hazaf karnay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: tybl sy dayta ko hatanay kay liye ayk trnkyt tybl byan aur byan sy hazaf karnay waly dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un main kuch akhtlafat hayn: trnkyt tybl: trnkyt tybl ayk day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) byan haay۔ yeh jldy aur mwsar tarykay sy astamal hawta haay۔tybl main mwjwd tamam dayta ko mؤsar tarykay sy hazaf karty hoey ، tybl main tamam ktaarwn ko hata dyn۔ tybl aapryshn ghair tranzaykshnl hay ، yany isy waps nahin kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tkhlyk dayta bys aur darap dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: dayta bys ka antzaam karnay kay liye ayk dayta bys ka byan aur ayk darap dayta bys byan dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un kay braks mkasad hayn: dayta bys bnaiyn: dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main ayk nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye ayk tkhlyk dayta bys ka byan astamal kya jata haay۔dayta bys tyar karnay kay liay۔ dayta bys kay byan main aam tawr par azuafy akhtyarat aur awsaaf shaml hawtay hain ، jesay dayta bys kryktr syt ، kwlyshn ، astwryj lwkyshn ، aur dyghr trtybat ki wzuahat krna۔ jab aml draamd kya jata hay tou ، dayta bys ka byan mkhsawsa nam aur trtybat kay sath khaly dayta bys bnata haay۔.darwp dayta bys: dayta bys mynjmnt sstm sy mwjwdha dayta bys ko hazaf karnay kay liye ayk darap dayta bys byan astamal kya jata hay

Question: byk ap dayta bys aur bhaaly dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: byk ap aur bhaaly kay kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye byk ap dayta bys ka byan aur bhaaly dayta bys kay byan ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un kay mkhtlf mkasad hayn: byk ap dayta bys: byk ap dayta bys ka byan mwjwdha dayta bys ka byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh aap ko ajazat dyta haay۔dayta bys kay dayta ki ayk kapy aur lagh failwn ko kesi khasa nktaha par wkt par bnaiyn۔ byk ap dayta bys kay byan main aam tawr par byk ap ki ksm (mkml ، tfryk ، ya tranzaykshn lagh byk ap) ، byk ap mnzal ، kmpryshn ، aur dyghr trtybat ki wzuahat karnay kay akhtyarat shaml hayn۔

Question: ghrant aur mnswkh karnay waly byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk ghrant ka byan aur mnswkh byan dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main saarf ki ajazatwn aur mraaat kay antzaam kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un kay braks mkasad hayn: ghrant byan: ghrant ka byan mkhsawsa mraaat ya ajazat denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: shw kay dayta bys aur astamal kay dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk shw dayta bys ka byan aur dayta bys kay sath astamal kay byan dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hayn: dayta bys dkhaiyn: dayta bys ka byan dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main dstyab tamam dayta bys ki fharst kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yeh ntyjha syt fraham krta haay۔yha un tamam dayta bys kay nam dkhata hay jn tak saarf tak rsaiy haasal haay۔ dayta bys kay byan ko dkhaiyn mwjwdha dayta bys kay syak wa sbak ko tbdyl nahin krta haay۔yha sirf mwjwdha dayta bys kay baray main malwmat haasal krta haay۔ yeh aksar sstm main dstyab dayta bys ko dykhnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ dayta bys ka astamal kryn: dayta bys kay sath astamal ka byan astamal kya jata hay

Question: shw ghrant aur shw mtghyr kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk khraby aaghiy.ya tou aap nay js anjn ki drkhwast ki hay woh mwjwd nahin hay ya aap ki drkhwast par karrwaiy karnay main koi aur msilha tha۔aghr yeh msilha brkrar rhata hay tou braha krm hum sy haylp daat kam par hamary haylp sntr kay zaryaay rabtaha kryn۔

Question: ayk wzuahat aur tjzayha tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: wzuahat aur tjzayha tybl kay byanat dono ko ays kyw ayl main astamal kya jata hay takha swalat ko kis tarah phansy di jati hay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay baray main malwmat aktha kryn۔taham ، woh mkhtlf mkasad ki khdmt karty hain aur mkhtlf ksm ki malwmat fraham karty hayn۔jb aap wzuahat kay sath kesi ays kyw ayl mntkhb krdha astfsar ko tyar karty hain tou ، yeh astfsar par amldraamd ka mnsawbha waps krta hay ، jo ays kyw ayl srwr ko astfsar par amldraamd karnay aur ntyjha syt ko bazayaft karnay kay liye jo akdamat athata hay is ki wzuahat krta haay۔wzuahat ki aaؤt pt main kay baray main tfsaylat shaml hain

Question: bwlyn aur tyny ant dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: bwlyn aur tyny ant dayta ki aksam dono ko mkhtlf dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main bwlyn akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin un kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat mwjwd hayn: bwlyn: bwlyn dayta ki ksm aam tawr par dayta bys main astamal hawty hay jo ays kyw ayl ki hamayt krty haay۔

Question: INT aur BIGINT dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
